Snapped4u

Snapped4U is a site for selling photos of people, pets and fundraisers at a set price or let photographers choose both the subject and price of their photos.

http://snapped4u.com/

What we did for Snapped4u:

Flatterline took over development of Snapped4U and immediately began fixing bugs that were affecting the user experience. After the site was stable, we embarked on a mission to add key features requested by the site's users.
